website_summaries.verdict: Low price for a good entry-level golf rangefinder. Easy to operate with simple features and basic button layout.
pros: Lightweight and easy to carry while you're playing
Price is far lower than most rangefinders
Better battery life than other low-priced golf rangefinders
cons: Easier to focus in on the flag than on hazards
No vibration feature to let you know you've hit the target

customer_reviews.title: Great rangefinder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. He used a gps app on his phone and he said this is far better. The only down side of this is it is hard to keep on a target and not be shakey. Both of us experienced this but not a deal breaker. Accurate readings once you figure it out. For the money this can't be beat. Make sure you get extra batteries. Set last about a month but he plays a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works Well & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Father's Day. We play together every week and figured it was about time he got one of these. We just used it yesterday and it worked great. The distances seemed right in line with the course markers and it's very easy to use. Their customer service has also reached out to me to make sure that I had a contact should I have any questions/problems with it. I'm very happy with this purchase and may buy a second one in the future for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chad F

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Bushnell at 1/3 the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Calibrated it against a $600 Bushnell and yardage was a dead match! You can get unit for 1/3 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feeback

customer_reviews.title: Great Device for a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my SLGRF20SL rangefinder on 6.30.2020 and immediately set it up and tested it out. I have another Laser Measuring device for construction that only goes to 100 yards. I tested them together to check distances. Both were identical on measurements. This one is very easy to use and for the price... I don't think you can beat it. Very Happy with the purchase and I think my Golf game will improve a little with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Victor C.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have this on pin seeker mode, ...
customer_reviews.text: make sure you have this on pin seeker mode, and press and hold the button as it passes over the part of the flag that has the reflectors, otherwise you're going to have held the time with this product! Is all in the instructions. I do have trouble getting pinned distance when getting a reading over a Hill where half the pin is obscured. I did call the company to ask how to deal with this and they did not come back.
customer_reviews.author: B Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Only works within 100yards of target
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Turned into a complete waste of money. I got this as a present for my dad, an avid golfer. Unfortunately, he stopped using it because it only works when you are within about 100yards of the pin. The rangefinder can’t differentiate the flag and surrounding landscape at greater than 100-110yards. He tried for several rounds of golf and both him and his buddies couldn’t get it to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia K.

customer_reviews.title: Distances All Over The Place
customer_reviews.text: After two rounds, I have given up and returned the unit. The problem is the unit can't lock onto the target. I was playing with three other people who had various golf range finders, from the wrist to an app on their phone. From 120+ I was often of 30-40 yards. My guess is it was picking up trees behind the green. If I kept reshooting eventually I got a good reading but then the issue becomes "which distance?" Golf is hard enough. A range finder is suppose to make it easier. This one does not. It appears to be inexpensive for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Gid

customer_reviews.title: Great Rangefinder for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on a rangefinder for my husband’s birthday but the best one out there based on reviews was the Bushnell-$600+ After reading the reviews on this one I decided to buy it. My husband loves it and he was glad I didn’t spend a lot on rangefinder. The only con about this item would be it’s a little shaky when trying to pin the flag. When playing with other golfers who had a bushnell it was the same reading as theirs but less money! I definitely recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy so Far!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, feel, and weight of it. It has a high definition view. It comes with your first battery which is about a $7. savings than others that do not come with battery. I haven’t used it golfing yet, but have great expectations. Past experience says they are all a little different measuring the same thing. I’m a pretty good recreational golfer that would prefer an accurate distance, but honestly rarely hit the same club in the same spot or in the exact same way 2 times in a row consistently. So Unless this thing is off by 5+ yards every time, it’s going to be great. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity to put this Rangefinder to the test on course but it has worked flawlessly thus far. This is my third rangefinder in three years. The display on the first died after a year and a half and the second drowned in a recent flood. I went to purchase another of the second one but they had raised the price over 40%. Right now this looks like the best value on Amazon. It does closely resemble the first one I bought but hopefully it will have better longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty operating this device
customer_reviews.text: Golf. Had trouble getting it to work properly! Was I holding down the button too long...or not long enough? Sometimes it refused to give me ANY distance at all! It often conflicted by 20 yards with my friend's wristband GPS,,which I KNOW has been 100% accurate for him! Finally, I got significant differences shooting the flag itself vs just the pole! Thoughts please advise as I am ready to return it soon! PW
customer_reviews.author: Phil W.

customer_reviews.title: Dollar for dollar the best buy when it comes to rangefinders
customer_reviews.text: Dollar for dollar the best buy when it comes to rangefinders. I've owned 3 bushnells and got tied of the breaking down. Why pay $150 more when this does the job? After playing 25 or so rounds with this it is not as accurate as other rangefinders. If I'm riding in a cart and my partner has his rangefinder we will compare and mine is always off a few yards. I can live with it but I think it is worth noting
customer_reviews.author: Edward E.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best range finder for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price, this product is hands down 5 stars. This is my second golf season using this product and I have used many other range finders side by side and it gives identical yardage. It does not beep or vibrate when it locks onto the flag, but I shot it a couple of times just to be sure it reads the correct target. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Golf Range finder
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived, small compact easy to use, not as bulky as my previous laser rangefinder. Loved the price also. Lightweight, seem to have less shaking when trying to use this one.
customer_reviews.author: golfer4

customer_reviews.title: Works Great at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Its replacing an older and expensive Bushnell Rangemaster which still works but I have to fight the battery door every time I picked it up. Very readable and matches up with very similar yardages with my playing partners. I play about 4 times a week and have had out about 10 times. At this price I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Pankratz

customer_reviews.title: Works if your patient and on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Works... does NOT correct for angle, and is not nearly as easy to use as more expensive models. Occasionally has a hard time finding the flag from the background. Still, it is functional for the price. Not sure how long it will last, that is still TBD.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M McHale

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dads birthday and while it's not perfect - you have to be right on the flag etc for it to give the distance, so it can sometimes be hard to get right at over 200yds but for the price can't complain too much
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great last night
customer_reviews.text: My first rangefinder. Worked great last night. Shot a pin at 184. Past 150 you'll need a steady hand to be sure you shoot the flag. But that's what I've heard about all rangefinders. Easy to shoot a tree behind it so make sure to shoot it a couple times to get a confident reading.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this range finder specifically for archery needs, not golf like most people. It worked perfectly. It was easy to use, even for me, which is definitely saying something. Clear instructions made it a breeze to learn. Easy to adjust. Super happy with this range finder.
customer_reviews.author: P. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Accurately reads distance.
customer_reviews.text: I live on a golf course and golf nearly every day. I absolutely love this range finder. It has hped me with my game. It is easy to determine the distance of the hole. It is very accurate. It gauges and is easy to read quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Caty Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rangefinder and I couldn't be happier. I play golf several times a week and have always felt that I would benefit from and enjoy having one, but the high price has always scared me off. Not anymore! This product is priced in a range that is super affordable, and....it works! I've tried several over the years (belonged to people I was golfing with), and have always struggled to lock in the pin. Not with this one. Super simple and easy. If you've been putting off a purchase, don't. Well worth the money, and I have been having a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daveypeah

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: Eyepiece kept popping off. The thread wouldn't hold the plastic cover - until I superglued it. Had to be careful not to glue the focusing mechanism. Once that was fixed, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so happy with this! I got it for Christmas and he keeps bringing up how much he loves it when we are golfing. I bought it because it had such great reviews and it does work well for finding the range for pins.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walkingstick

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate, and sleek design. Rangefinders aren’t cheap (especially if you want a reliable product), but you can’t be he price and usability of this one. It’s made a world of difference in my club selection and overall game (no more overshooting the green!) highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a TecTecTec rangefinder with this one, and I’m still getting used to the way the scan feature works. I liked my old one, but for $60 less this one seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Coglon

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money Range Finder
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and its value for money pricing. What I dislike is having to replace the first one I got and struggling to get it to work - eventually due to the battery still having its plastic cover. It took me a few hours to figure it out - best to put this fact in the instructions. Otherwise great product to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ong Ang

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father. He said there’s a learning curve because it can be hard to keep on a target. But after playing around with it for a while he said he has it figured out and is happy with it. He has given his blessings for a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Sally H

customer_reviews.title: Great decision to give this a chance
customer_reviews.text: Worth more than it's price! As promised in description and other reviews. I find it even easier to use than the more expensive brands (the yardage is larger on the display). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this rangefinder! I used it for the first time this weekend and it worked great! I played golf with a friend who had a Bushnell, and it was spot on with hers; at half the price. I'm very satisfied so far with this product and would recommend it to any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Landry

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Can’t trust this device. Maybe if it was on a tripod it would work. I can’t hold it steady enough to get any accuracy out of it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: Good $135 range finder
customer_reviews.text: I thought i losy my other range finder so ordered this one. Worked ok but hard to get it focused sometimes
customer_reviews.author: mikeo

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use very accurate ..... but the batter omg put it in and taking it out omg new design needed there for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jared p.

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and easy to adjust the focus on the eyepiece.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I found missing was a way to attach the actual rangefinder to a tether to the outside of my golf bag. However, it comes with a convenient soft case that has a belt loop for attachment to your bag or pants belt and the case is closed with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Deryl J. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to my husband's new found hobby
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my husband's new found hobby. He loves it ... light weight, accurate and compact. Fits the bill perfectly. Highly recommend this to help with your game :)
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: My old Bushnell finally gave out after lots of good years. Went to replace it with another Bushnell ...
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever left a product review. My old Bushnell finally gave out after lots of good years. Went to replace it with another Bushnell but the price was way more than I thought I needed to spend. This one works absolutely perfect for like 1/3 the Bushnell price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an inferior product and it was returned for refund. It is too difficult to focus and lock in on target and readings are very inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for golfers
customer_reviews.text: This was the ultimate fathers day gift for my boyfriend. Lightweight and user friendly. Accurate measurements, crisp sight lines and even calculates slope. It seems durable enough to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product!!! When compared with a more expensive Bushnell, it was always within 2 yards, but 90% of the time it was the exact same or 1 yard off. Can't justify paying double for the bushnell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally the worst rangefinder I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I golf all the time and had a good rangefinder before losing it. Wanted a new one and bought this cheap one.... Easily the worst range finder I’ve ever used. Can’t get a reading unless 80 yards and in. Literally the worst rangefinder I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't easily lock on the far flag ! You get what you pay for... I can't understand how this product got so many good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I’m new to golf and this is helping me to navigate the course.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sfakianos

customer_reviews.title: Great price and seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice and and no problems. sometimes have to sweep it across the pin to pick up correct yardage, but that could just be me. Great price and seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and easy to learn to use. The price is right and it works. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said it is spot on and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he used it for the first time today. He said it is spot on and easy to use! He's super happy with it! Excellent product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL - Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product EVER. Bought it as a Christmas gift for my husband. Tried to use it for the first time in late February. Would not even pick up tree. He had tried it multiple times at different courses and still won’t work. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McKinney

customer_reviews.title: in fine condition, as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, in fine condition, as described, and is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Don S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's providing me with very inaccurate readings. And it was the first time I used it. Extremely disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best priced range finder on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best priced range finder on the market and extremely functional and very easy to use. With 12 month warranty it’s a no brainer. I’m extremely happy with mine, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. J Uys

customer_reviews.title: A good bit less expensive than some of the other name ...
customer_reviews.text: A good bit less expensive than some of the other name brands, range finders. I have used the other brands this one does the same thing ,just as fast. just as clear. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Poche

customer_reviews.title: range finder
customer_reviews.text: You'd better have a pretty good idea of the pin distance before you look through the view finder. the readings will flip considerably from too far to too short
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars I’m all areas (if I could have). Used it the day I Received it, and it did not work, couldn’t pick up any of the flags, water, bunkers, etc. Did not provide a reading for me a single time, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seller reached out to me to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This item came very promptly. The seller reached out to me to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. It was a gift for my husband and he was very happy with it. He is looking forward to it improving his gold game!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Does not give accurate measurements
customer_reviews.text: I only tried it for one game but the unit is constantly off by 20 or 30 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I tested this Rangefinder against a more expensive one used by a friend, and there was no material difference in the result. So for a substantially cheaper price you get just as accurate a measurement.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: ... this for awhile now and it is still working great. Gives me great yardage and is always within ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for awhile now and it is still working great. Gives me great yardage and is always within a yard or two of a Bushnell. Best rangefinder for the value, it’s not like yard or two it is off is going to make that much difference in my game anyways. Playing from a 12 handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cameron

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband birthday, he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless to the point that after you take 5 minutes to get a reading it's off by a comical amount (often over 50 off) wouldn't pay $15 for it much less $100.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the big box stuff at a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Martino

customer_reviews.title: fairly accurate but get many reading b4 stabilized
customer_reviews.text: Not bad and will keep but seems a little hard to actually get a final reading. Seems to get wide variety of reading as have to do several times to actual get stable reading on pin.
customer_reviews.author: jlester333

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lost my expensive Laser.....so, tried this one after reading all reviews....this works perfectly...all you need!
customer_reviews.author: Paige R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Rangefinder for Price
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Wish battery was easier to install (-1 star). Being laser, you need to "see" your target so I use in conjunction with GPS range finder.
customer_reviews.author: MikRon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, very easy customer service and shipped out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, very easy customer service and shipped out immediately. Product was half the cost of a Bushnell or other so called "top of the line products." I lined up directly beside a friend with one of the Bushnell Tour X range finders and all of my distances read the exact same as his. Definitely recommended for any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Functional. We'll see how long it lasts, but it does the job + or - a yard. Pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyLee43

customer_reviews.title: NO WAY TO TELL WHAT ITS PICKING UP IN FOREGROUND OR BEHIND PIN ...
customer_reviews.text: SOLD IT TO A FRIEND FOR $20 , I THINK I MADE A PRETTY GOOD DEAL , 2 MOS LATER
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Malmat

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated the customer service
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to get a reading that was accurate. But when I contacted customer service they replaced with a new were version which works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Rangefinder.
customer_reviews.text: I play 4 - 5 times a week and it works great with good visibility. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hare

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: I "lost" a Bushnell, so I decided not to spend big bucks this time in case it happened again. This does everything the more expensive model did for much less money! Deserves its 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good price point.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and compact and came at a good price. It works well for finding your distances and targeting the pin or a specific object so you know exactly how far you need to hit the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Doner

customer_reviews.title: Good low budget range finder
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive range finder; can be hard to lock in on the pin, but works well enough
customer_reviews.author: Michael Toohey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Each time I shoot the same target I get a different distance. The instructions were poor and I couldn't connect with anyone to help me. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Devine

customer_reviews.title: Works great! as accurate as my friends $300 range finder
customer_reviews.text: Works great! as accurate as my friends $300 range finder. Just takes a little getting used to zeroing in on the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Pas1004

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price a great product. I find it usually a yard or two off. but Im okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williams

customer_reviews.title: A happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product I just purchased. It is very easy to use and performs the job just what I want. The price is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy-to-use & well priced - you could spend significantly more for other brands that do the same thing, but why?
customer_reviews.author: Linda B. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This unit met my expectations. The pinspotter was accurate. It's light and easy to use. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Byers

customer_reviews.title: Very solid rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: It is a good rangefinder, I've used a couple better. The only negative I have about it is that if you don't have a steady hand then it will have a little problem hitting the flag. But that is the only negative. For the money you won't find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve aydelette

customer_reviews.title: For the money great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on courses with laser polls but not as good on other polls.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for one season
customer_reviews.text: We only had this for a year and it is already not working. It doesn’t show the distance from the flag once shot toward it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product would be even better if the meters were left out.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but hard to read.
customer_reviews.text: The yardage is provided through the lens. The lettering is difficult to read because it is very small and transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for golfer
customer_reviews.text: Good for measuring distances that are unmarked or wrong. The case is a little too snug. Does what is expected. Good response time and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Glinski

customer_reviews.title: This does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I may be old-school, but i just feels solid. Took it to driving range and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to use. Love the adjustable focus ring (for those of us without perfect vision)!
customer_reviews.author: MS10r

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Builder!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on course. Takes a little bit to get used to but once you’re used to it, it’s great. It does help your game if your confident in what your yardage is to the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Builder

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for one round so far. A little hard to pick up the flag - not as easy as my old Bushnell but a good value.
customer_reviews.author: RSB461

customer_reviews.title: It's a game of inches!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. No need to buy the higher priced brands. This does everything you'll need to find distance. Extremely accurate too!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Douglas Miller

customer_reviews.title: returned didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't show the distance at all. The viewing screen had no marking at all on it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman R Elsner

customer_reviews.title: While it works it's a great item BUT the batteries die fast
customer_reviews.text: While it works it's a great item BUT the batteries die fast. Also sometimes it's difficult to turn it on. Not convenient when you have other players waiting for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get accurate distance to the tee
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy when trying to figure out the distance to the tee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: For the first few months this product worked, but it was always hard to lock in on the flag. Less than a year after purchasing it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like the range finder a lot have tried to use ...
customer_reviews.text: i like the range finder a lot have tried to use others that were much higher priced but had trouble focusing on the target the serenelife seems to pick up the target very easily and is very accurate i am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for 3 rounds so far... Does everything a $400 Bushnell can do, but for nearly 1/3 the price. Great value, great product. Fully met my needs and expectations so far!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I used the rangefinder for two rounds this past weekend. It is very easy to use. I was pleased with the accuracy. Very comparable to more expensive units that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Langton

customer_reviews.title: Used just a few times, hard to target in ...
customer_reviews.text: Used just a few times, hard to target in on flag. Takes a while but accurate when you obtain target.
customer_reviews.author: bodot

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to use. A little unstable, but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Matched it with my Uncles bushnell rangefinder and it got the same distances within 2-3 yards. GREAT PRODUCT and easy to use and for such a great price! Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a Golf rangefinder. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, great price
customer_reviews.text: Used this during my last 4 day golf outing. It was precise, nearly matching my gps. You do need to focus the ocular but I found I could do that one handed while shooting the flag stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Frank

customer_reviews.title: For me to get a correct distance
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the product. One thing is it very simple. I use it for golf , and the fact that it is fast and simple that a winner for me
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M. McKneely

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be within a yard of the higher priced ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be within a yard of the higher priced ones, I have a harder time picking up flags over 200 yards, hopefully that's just me getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This product showed up on time, and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up on time, and so far it works perfectly! I have only been able to test it on the range thus far, but distances seem spot on. I am looking forward to trying it out on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SereneLife Advanced Golf Laser Rangefinder - 546.2 Yard Digital Accuracy Distance Meter with Pinsensor Technology, 6X Magnification and 2 Modes for Hunting, Shooting, Archery and More - SLGRF20SL
feature_bullets: ACCURATE RANGEFINDER; Our Laser Rangefinder is a premium product, measuring up to 540 yards with 1-yard accuracy and Pin sensor technology, and a durable, water resistant body.

SMART PIN SEEKER MODE: Beside the standard distance measuring detection mode, this smart rangefinder features a "pin seeker" setting - technology that locks on to your target flag and "figures out" the distance to it, it's a real lifesaver!

EASY ONE BUTTON OPERATION: This rangefinder is designed to be very simple to use, so you can focus on your game. All you have to do is aim and press a button, and it will show you the distance to your target on its digital interface display readout!
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE; With a water and dust resistant, durable body, perfect for carrying while golfing or hunting, or for measuring and surveying without extra weight or bulk.

FULL PACKAGE: This a handheld, lightweight, portable tool that any golfer should carry around. That's why, along with your rangefinder, you'll receive a durable, zipper secured carrying case - so you can take it anywhere with you
